testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application loads and displays the LocalEats landing page with restaurant discovery features
steps: Wait for page to fully load
Verify 'LocalEats' branding or logo is visible
Check for restaurant listings or featured restaurants section
Verify search bar or discovery features are present
Check for navigation menu (Home, Search, Cart, Profile)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page displays with restaurant discovery features, not a Vite placeholder
testCases.failureCondition: If page shows only 'Vite + React' text or blank page

testCases.name: Landing Page Content Test
testCases.description: Verify landing page displays restaurants, weekly picks, and recommendations
steps: Look for 'Weekly Picks' or 'Featured Restaurants' section
Verify restaurant cards are displayed with images, names, ratings
Check for cuisine type badges (Italian, Japanese, Mexican, etc.)
Look for 'Order Now' or 'View Menu' buttons
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page shows rich restaurant content with images and details
testCases.failureCondition: No restaurant content visible or only placeholder text

testCases.name: Navigation Components Test
testCases.description: Test top navigation bar and mobile bottom navigation
steps: Check for top navigation bar (desktop view)
Verify navigation includes: Home, Search, Favorites, Cart, Profile/Login
On mobile view, check for bottom navigation bar
Verify all navigation links are clickable
Verify search icon or search bar is present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation is fully functional with all expected links
testCases.failureCondition: Navigation missing or non-functional

testCases.name: Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test restaurant search with filters and suggestions
steps: Submit search and navigate to results page
Verify restaurants matching search term are displayed
Check for filter options (cuisine, price, rating, delivery)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search works with suggestions and filters, displays relevant results
testCases.failureCondition: Search doesn't work or shows no results

testCases.name: Restaurant Listing Display
testCases.description: Verify restaurant cards display complete information
steps: Verify each restaurant card shows: name, cuisine type, rating, price range
Check for 'Open Now' or hours status
Verify distance from user location (if location enabled)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Restaurant cards display comprehensive information
testCases.failureCondition: Missing critical information like name, rating, or image

testCases.name: User Login Flow
steps: Verify successful redirect to home or dashboard
Check if user name/profile appears in navigation
Verify authentication persists on page reload
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and authentication persists
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails or redirects incorrectly

testCases.name: User Registration Flow
steps: Fill in full name, email, password, phone number
Check if user is automatically logged in after signup
testCases.expectedOutcome: New user can register successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Registration form doesn't work or shows errors

testCases.name: User Logout Flow
steps: Find and click logout button (usually in profile menu)
Verify redirect to login or home page
Verify user is logged out (protected routes redirect to login)
Try accessing /profile - should redirect to login
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs out and auth state clears
testCases.failureCondition: User remains logged in after logout

testCases.name: Restaurant Detail Page Test
steps: Click on any restaurant card from landing page
Verify navigation to restaurant detail page
Check for restaurant name, description, cuisine types
Verify hero image and photo gallery
Verify menu categories and items are displayed
Check for 'Add to Cart' or 'Order' buttons
testCases.expectedOutcome: Restaurant detail page shows complete information and menu
testCases.failureCondition: Detail page is blank or missing critical sections

testCases.name: Menu Items Display Test
testCases.description: Verify menu items show with prices and descriptions
steps: On restaurant detail page, scroll to menu section
Verify menu is organized by categories
Check that each item shows: name, description, price
Check for dietary indicators (vegetarian, gluten-free, etc.)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Menu displays organized with complete item information
testCases.failureCondition: Menu is empty or items lack prices

testCases.name: Add to Cart Functionality
testCases.description: Test adding menu items to shopping cart
steps: On restaurant detail page, find a menu item
If customization modal appears, make selections and confirm
Verify success message or cart badge updates
Verify item appears in cart with correct details and price
testCases.expectedOutcome: Items successfully add to cart and appear in cart page
testCases.failureCondition: Add to cart doesn't work or items don't appear in cart

testCases.name: Cart Management Test
testCases.description: Test cart quantity updates and item removal
steps: Add at least 2 items to cart
Decrease quantity or remove an item
Test 'Clear Cart' or remove all items
testCases.expectedOutcome: Cart quantity and totals update correctly
testCases.failureCondition: Quantity changes don't update totals or fail

testCases.name: Checkout Process Test
steps: Check order summary with items and total
testCases.expectedOutcome: Checkout page displays with all required sections
testCases.failureCondition: Checkout page errors or missing sections

testCases.name: Favorites Feature Test
testCases.description: Test saving and viewing favorite restaurants (requires login)
steps: Find a restaurant card or detail page
Verify restaurant appears in favorites list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Favorites functionality works, restaurants save and display
testCases.failureCondition: Favorite action doesn't work or page is empty

testCases.name: Order History Test
testCases.description: Test viewing past orders (requires login with existing orders)
steps: Check each order shows: restaurant, date, items, total
Click on an order to view details
Verify order detail page shows complete information
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order history displays with complete order information
testCases.failureCondition: No orders shown or order details missing

testCases.name: Restaurant Reviews Display
steps: Navigate to a restaurant detail page
Verify reviews are displayed with: reviewer name, rating, date, text
Check for review photos if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Reviews display with complete information
testCases.failureCondition: Reviews section missing or empty for restaurants with reviews

testCases.name: Write Review Test
testCases.description: Test writing a restaurant review (requires login)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Review form works and submits successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Can't access review form or submission fails

testCases.name: User Profile Page Test
steps: Verify user information displays: name, email, phone
Look for user statistics (orders, reviews, favorites)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Profile page displays complete user information
testCases.failureCondition: Profile page is blank or missing user data

testCases.name: Settings Page Test
testCases.description: Test user settings and preferences (requires login)
steps: Verify sections: Account, Notifications, Privacy, Addresses, Payment
Look for privacy settings (profile visibility, review visibility)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Settings page displays all preference sections
testCases.failureCondition: Settings page missing or sections don't work

testCases.name: Notifications Test
testCases.description: Test notifications page and notifications (requires login)
steps: Click notification bell icon in navigation
Verify notifications dropdown or page opens
Verify notifications display with type, message, timestamp
Check for 'Mark all as read' option
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notifications display and can be marked as read
testCases.failureCondition: Notifications page errors or doesn't show notifications

testCases.name: Map View Test
steps: Check for restaurant markers on map
Verify restaurant popup or card displays
Check if map shows user location
testCases.expectedOutcome: Map displays with restaurant markers and is interactive
testCases.failureCondition: Map doesn't load or no markers visible

testCases.name: Weekly Picks Feature Test
steps: Verify featured restaurants for the week are displayed
Check for special descriptions or highlights
Click on a weekly pick restaurant
Verify navigation to restaurant detail page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Weekly picks display with featured descriptions
testCases.failureCondition: Page is empty or no picks displayed

testCases.name: Discounts and Offers Test
steps: Verify discounts display with: title, description, discount amount
If logged in, test applying discount to cart
Verify discount reflects in cart total
testCases.expectedOutcome: Discounts display and can be applied to orders
testCases.failureCondition: No discounts shown or application fails

testCases.name: Mobile Responsiveness Test
steps: Check that bottom navigation appears on mobile
Test that all buttons are tappable
Verify text is readable without horizontal scrolling
Test mobile menu/hamburger menu if present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is fully responsive and usable on mobile
testCases.failureCondition: Layout breaks or elements overlap on mobile

testCases.name: Tablet Responsiveness Test
steps: Verify restaurant cards display in grid (2 columns)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays optimally on tablet screens
testCases.failureCondition: Layout doesn't adapt or looks broken

testCases.name: Advanced Search Filters Test
steps: Verify available filters: Cuisine Type, Price Range, Rating, Distance
Verify results update to show only Italian restaurants
testCases.expectedOutcome: Filters work correctly and update results
testCases.failureCondition: Filters don't apply or results don't change

testCases.name: Restaurant Hours Display Test
testCases.description: Test display of restaurant hours and open status
steps: Verify hours display for all days of week
testCases.expectedOutcome: Restaurant hours display accurately with current status
testCases.failureCondition: Hours missing or status incorrect

testCases.name: Restaurant Photo Gallery Test
steps: Verify lightbox or full-size view opens
testCases.expectedOutcome: Photo gallery displays and lightbox works
testCases.failureCondition: Photos don't display or lightbox doesn't work

testCases.name: 404 Error Page Test
steps: Verify 'Return Home' or navigation link exists
testCases.expectedOutcome: Custom 404 page displays with navigation options
testCases.failureCondition: Blank page or generic browser 404

testCases.name: Loading States Test
steps: Verify loading spinners or skeletons appear during data fetch
Check that loading states don't persist indefinitely
Test that page renders properly after loading completes
Verify smooth transitions between loading and loaded states
testCases.expectedOutcome: Loading indicators display appropriately and complete
testCases.failureCondition: No loading feedback or eternal loading states

testCases.name: Form Validation Test
steps: Test same validation on signup form
testCases.expectedOutcome: Forms validate input and show helpful error messages
testCases.failureCondition: Forms submit without validation or unclear errors

testCases.name: Price and Currency Display Test
testCases.description: Test consistent price display throughout app
steps: View menu items on restaurant page
Verify prices show with $ symbol and 2 decimal places
Verify subtotal, delivery fee, tax, and total in cart/checkout
Check that all monetary values format consistently
testCases.expectedOutcome: All prices display correctly formatted with currency symbol
testCases.failureCondition: Prices missing, incorrect format, or calculation errors

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Test
steps: Test keyboard navigation (Tab key through interactive elements)
Check that buttons and links have descriptive text
Check that form labels are associated with inputs
testCases.expectedOutcome: Basic accessibility standards are met
testCases.failureCondition: Cannot navigate with keyboard or poor contrast

testCases.name: Page Load Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application load time and performance
steps: Measure time to interactive (should be under 3 seconds)
Verify no console errors during load
Test navigation between pages is smooth
Check that subsequent page loads are faster (cached)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly with good performance
testCases.failureCondition: Slow loading (>5 seconds) or performance issues
